title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 158.7 - Reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 158.7 - Reports

State Regulations

Each board of education or board of cooperative educational
services receiving a grant pursuant to this Part shall submit to the
commissioner an interim progress report no later than January 15th of the
school year in which the grant is received, and a final report no later than

August 31st of the following school year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
158.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
